Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - Blanket custom retention policies which apply to all Audit recordTypes
Description:
Microsoft Purview is enhancing the Audit custom retention policy experience. With this change, customers can now create blanket custom retention policies which will apply to all Audit recordTypes. This capability will become available in addition to the existing support of manually selecting specific recordTypes in the custom policy.
GA date: October CY2024
